formattedAddress: 315 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 315 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Amazing people work here that‚Äôs all I will say. Don't be swayed by bad reviews. There's bad apples everywhere on earth. Better than doing nothing for the injustice you might be facing before realizing you need to speak to someone from here.. first, not the local precinct.

I saw some officers being bribed and they helped me resolve it and saw me to help right away within the week. I was impressed with actually how much more professional they conduct business than most local precincts I hear about when reporting a crime. Kinda sucks if you're reporting a major crime to another criminal that just looks like a cop because he/she's simply dressed in uniform. Stay informed, people!

originalText.text: One of NYPD‚Äôs Peace Officers tried to run me over with her car while I was riding my bike. I took a picture of the  license plate that also had a sckull sticker of the police flag next to it. I emailed the photo along with my complaint. I received calls that seemed like a game of phone tag. I don‚Äôt think internal affairs really cared. They just left voicemail messages to call them back, when I did I was told to leave another message.  üê∑investigating üê∑ is never a fair dealüí©üê∑

originalText.text: 103rd is going in cars with no probable cause   Last week I got pulled over by two women in uniform in blk undercover car pulled me over in queens Jamaica estates between 175/176th   The two women approach my car let passenger jump out n said pulled me over for no seat belt   I've been pulled over without probable cause and don't give reason to search car the incident with the two women happened may 25th 2016 at about 9am
